title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document functional and non-functional requirements for the HoloLens_Pro augmented reality glasses.

title: Design AR Interface and User Experience
description: Create the user interface design for the HoloLens_Pro glasses, focusing on seamless integration of digital information with the real world.

title: Develop Hardware Prototypes
description: Design and create hardware prototypes for the HoloLens_Pro glasses, including integration of sensors and components.

title: Implement Core AR Functionality
description: Develop the core augmented reality functionality for the HoloLens_Pro glasses, focusing on accurate blending of digital information with the real world.
dependencies: Design AR Interface and User Experience

title: Develop Mobile App for Remote Configuration and Updates
description: Create a mobile app that allows users to configure and update the HoloLens_Pro glasses remotely.

title: Integrate with External APIs and Services
description: Connect the HoloLens_Pro glasses to external APIs and services, such as weather forecasts or social media feeds.

title: Conduct Beta Testing
description: Test the HoloLens_Pro glasses with a selected group of beta testers to identify and fix issues.
dependencies: Develop Mobile App for Remote Configuration and Updates

title: Prepare User Manual and Documentation
description: Write user manuals, technical documentation, and tutorials to guide users in using the HoloLens_Pro glasses.

title: Deploy HoloLens_Pro to Market
description: Coordinate the release of the HoloLens_Pro glasses to the market, including manufacturing, marketing, and distribution.
